@senatemajldr “Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell (R-Ky.) said Friday that more than a third of Republican senators will NOT vote for any coronavirus relief package, underscoring division with his caucus.”

When 1/3rd @GOP WON’T vote ANY #COVID19 relief package, I don’t think dems fault!
